travel_why.reasons: It"s fine I can carry on.
I get anxious in crowded spaces and so if the train gets too packed I have to get off and try and catch another one which causes me to sometimes be late for work.

travel_why_not.reasons: I can"t ride a bike since I had both legs amputated in 1987.
because my blindness makes it almost impossible to see the bus coming, know whether it"s the right bus, safely get on or navigate my way to a seat etc etc.
